channel.title: ProfScape - Looking for some good coders and graphic artists
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
First, I will introduce myself. I am Bas, I'm 16 years old and I live in Holland. I have my own registered web-design company, and i have a lot of experience with HTML, Java, PHP, CSS, MYSQL, ASP, JavaScript, AJAX and a littlebit C sharp. I am going to make a very nice server, based of the DavidScape source, because I think it's the best 508 around at the moment. I am already busy with the website, and it's looking pretty good. Ofcourse the server will be HD, and we're going to make the server just like RS, so no customs etc.
So, I am looking for a nice team. Here are the people I need:
[ul][li]3 Java coders, you need good experience with Java and RS Private Servers;[/li] [li]1 PHP coder, you need experience with HTML, PHP, mysql and JavaScript;[/li] [li]2Graphic Artists, you need to be good with Paint ;], obviously you need to be good in RuneScape Graphics.[/li][/ul]
Please do not apply in this thread, but please PM me, and please be serious, I really want a good team to work with, and together we're going to make the best 508 server around!
Thanks for reading, Bas

@krackkid wrote:

I know how to use the paint bucket, in paint can I get the job?

item.title: ProfScape - Looking for some good coders and graphic artists
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Flaws:-
1] Its not a PHP Coder its a Web-Script Coder.
2) If your Graphic Artist’s use Paint you will NEVER get anywhere.
3) C Sharp has NOTHING to do with RSPS unless your going to intregate your server with C-Sharp or its going to be used for side-projects.
4) I doubt you will the best 508 around.

Read full topic
